get.namespace.uri
Prev Part 4. Titlepage Template Stylesheet Reference Next

get.namespace.uri

get.namespace.uri — Obtain URI for an element identified by a string containing qualified name

Synopsis

<xsl:template name="get.namespace.uri">
<xsl:param name="element.name"/>
<xsl:param name="reference.node" select="."/>
<xsl:param name="missing.namespace.warning" select="not(/t:templates/@t:missing-namespace-ok = 'yes')"/>
  ...
</xsl:template>

Description

This template interprets a string containing a qualified name of an element and returns the namespace URI for that element, looking for namespace prefixes starting from a reference node.
